pr_title: [RW-4737][risk=no] Enable Google Private IP Adddress flag on new project creation

timeline.message: enable private IP Google Access for new projects

timeline.bodyText: This was a very critical log line for debugging in GAE logs. The change is also entirely unrelated to the PR. Please revert this.
timeline.author: calbach

replies.bodyText: OK. It's an annoyance locally and doesn't give me much context about what was going on. I thought it was just leftover and tried to clean it up.
replies.author: jaycarlton

replies.bodyText: Is it supposed to fire every minute?
replies.author: jaycarlton

replies.bodyText: No, though it might if you have local UI  tab open that's polling your API server. If you paste the logs you observed, I can try and answer. The log line is expected to run on every authenticated request.
replies.author: calbach
